title: issues with downloading `ds000114` derivatives from inside a docker image
body:
@mih told me that you would love to have more issues to solve (and also that I should put my issue here, too). As discussed in https://github.com/miykael/nipype_tutorial/issues/79, we have problem to download the `workshops/nih-2017/ds000114` deriviatves, from inside the docker image. Outside, it doesn't create any problem.

I've set up a docker image `miykael/datalad_test`, with which you can recreate the issue. It installed `datalad_neuroimaging` via `pip` and installed the openfmri dataset with `datalad install -r ///workshops/nih-2017/ds000114`. Some more information:
```
git-annex version: 6.20180416+gitg86b18966f-1~ndall+1
datalad 0.10.0.rc1
```

 So, to open the docker image to recreate the issue, just use

```
docker run -it --rm miykael/datalad_test
```

And once inside, try:
```
datalad get ds000114/derivatives/fmriprep/sub-01.html
```

Which will give you the error:
```
[ERROR  ] from web...                                                                                 
| from web...
| Unable to access these remotes: web
| Try making some of these repositories available:
| 	0000...0001 -- web
|  	b8b7...8eb9 -- yoh@smaug:/mnt/btrfs/datasets/datalad/crawl/workshops/nih-workshop-2017/ds000114/derivatives/fmriprep
|  [get(/home/neuro/ds000114/derivatives/fmriprep/sub-01.html)] 
get(error): /home/neuro/ds000114/derivatives/fmriprep/sub-01.html (file) [from web...
from web...
Unable to access these remotes: web
Try making some of these repositories available:
	0000...0001 -- web
 	b8b7...8eb9 -- yoh@smaug:/mnt/btrfs/datasets/datalad/crawl/workshops/nih-workshop-2017/ds000114/derivatives/fmriprep
```

I'm sorry to annoy you with this issue, but I'm really stuck with the problem and don't see how to solve it.
